fn.p: Author contributions S.J., I.T. and R.V. conceived the analysis, interpreted the results and wrote the paper. S.J. did the analysis with the help of J.M.L.-R. J.P.M., F.T., B.B. and M.W. collaborated in discussing the results and writing the paper. B.B. and M.W. provided observational and GCM data. O.B.C., A.C., M.D., G.N., S.K., E.v.M. and C.T. performed the analysed EURO-CORDEX simulations, provided the output of interest for this study and revised the overall paper.
